page.title: 14Local News in Sth.Northants
page.content:
The most recent piece of news is the Treasure Hunt in which people had to find answers to questions based on places or things in the village.There has also been aÂ£fayre'in the village witch had dodgems,flying chairs,fruit machines,space invaders.It also had a thing which you could bounce around on and it was in the shape of a castle. There was also some candy floss and some hot dogs,popcorn and drinks in a beefburger & mustard pot shaped stall. There was a stall for the little kids with a train and a car.The school have had their sports day and everybody got entertained for three-quarters of an hour.With egg and spoon races,skipping obstacle and stepping stones all the children had a good time.
Jonathan Cashen & Richard Messenger,11.
